channel.title: [PI] Slayer system help
channel.description:
i added the new slayer system from here
[url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/snippets/466901-pi-advanced-upgraded-slayer.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/snippets/466901-pi-advanced-upgraded-slayer.html[/url]
and it works great aside from one thing the rewards shop doesnt open and i cant for the life of me figure out which method to call to open it i seriously need help with this so any help is greatly appreciated
p.s. sorry if you dont like links to other sites being posted but thats the only place i could find it and all the information is their and its easier then posting all my .java files in a code

item.title: [PI] Slayer system help
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

the shop interface is just that an interface. Go to rsinterface and find out the interface id. Go to clickingbuttons or whatever and put in that interface id and have it open a shop id or whatever?

Read full topic
